Enable Custom Inheritance Description: Apply values from inheritance_config.json to all traits.
Regenerate Config Description: Rebuild inheritance_config.json with default inherit rates for every trait.
Modify_Inherit_Traits:
Modify the traits that will be
inherited every time
Made by:Xudros
trait_selector_desc: Select a trait that every set actor has 100% chance to inherit
race_window_tab_desc: Select which races you would like the selected traits to be 100% inherited in
load_desc: Once you press this button the selected traits and races will be saved and will now start inheriting the traits you selected
